name: Healthyfied Mashed Unripe Plantain
description: This Healthyfied Mashed Unripe Plantain recipe is a delightful twist on traditional mashed recipes, tailor-made for those seeking low-sodium, healthy options. Perfect for anyone looking to enjoy healthier versions of their favorite dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the unripe plantains and cut them into chunks.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot, boil the plantain chunks until they become tender, about 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: While the plantains are boiling, finely dice the red bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Once the plantains are tender, drain the water and transfer the plantains to a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the evaporated milk, salted butter, salt, and diced red bell pepper to the warm plantains.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the mixture until smooth and well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
